member.name: T:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.GeolocationCoordinate
member.summary: Represents a Geolocation Coordinate.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.GeolocationCoordinate.Latitude
member.summary: Representing the latitude of the position in decimal degrees.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.GeolocationCoordinate.Longitude
member.summary: Represents the longitude of a geographical position, specified in decimal degrees.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.GeolocationCoordinate.HasCoordinates
member.summary: Checks to and are defined.

member.name: M:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.GeolocationCoordinate.ToString
member.summary: Formats coordinates to Maps specific string or return Empty.

member.name: T:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.GeolocationData
member.summary: Represents a Geo Coordinate or Address to show on Maps.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.GeolocationData.Address
member.summary: Represents a secondary location as a string address. It will be omitted if and coordinates are defined.

member.name: M:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.GeolocationData.ToString
member.summary: Formats coordinates to Maps specific string or return address.
member.returns: Maps specific geo coordinates or address

member.name: T:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.GoogleMapLatLng
member.summary: A LatLng is a point in geographical coordinates: latitude and longitude.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.GoogleMapLatLng.Latitude
member.summary: Latitude ranges between -90 and 90 degrees, inclusive. Values above or below this range will be clamped to the range [-90, 90]. This means that if the value specified is less than -90, it will be set to -90. And if the value is greater than 90, it will be set to 90.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.GoogleMapLatLng.Longitude
member.summary: Longitude ranges between -180 and 180 degrees, inclusive. Values above or below this range will be wrapped so that they fall within the range. For example, a value of -190 will be converted to 170. A value of 190 will be converted to -170. This reflects the fact that longitudes wrap around the globe.

member.name: T:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapPolylineOptions
member.summary: PolylineOptions object used to define the properties that can be set on a Polyline. https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/javascript/reference/polygon#Polyline

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapPolylineOptions.Clickable
member.summary: Indicates whether this Polyline handles mouse events. Defaults to true.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapPolylineOptions.Draggable
member.summary: If set to true, the user can drag this shape over the map. The geodesic property defines the mode of dragging. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapPolylineOptions.Editable
member.summary: If set to true, the user can edit this shape by dragging the control points shown at the vertices and on each segment. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapPolylineOptions.Geodesic
member.summary: When true, edges of the polygon are interpreted as geodesic and will follow the curvature of the Earth. When false, edges of the polygon are rendered as straight lines in screen space. Note that the shape of a geodesic polygon may appear to change when dragged, as the dimensions are maintained relative to the surface of the earth. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapPolylineOptions.Icons
member.summary: The icons to be rendered along the polyline.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapPolylineOptions.Path
member.summary: The ordered sequence of coordinates of the Polyline.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapPolylineOptions.StrokeColor
member.summary: The stroke color. All CSS3 colors are supported except for extended named colors.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapPolylineOptions.StrokeOpacity
member.summary: The stroke opacity between 0.0 and 1.0.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapPolylineOptions.StrokeWeight
member.summary: The stroke width in pixels.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapPolylineOptions.Visible
member.summary: Whether this polyline is visible on the map. Defaults to true.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapPolylineOptions.ZIndex
member.summary: The zIndex compared to other polys.

member.name: T:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapIconSequence
member.summary: Describes how icons are to be rendered on a line.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapIconSequence.FixedRotation
member.summary: If true, each icon in the sequence has the same fixed rotation regardless of the angle of the edge on which it lies. Defaults to false, in which case each icon in the sequence is rotated to align with its edge.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapIconSequence.Icon
member.summary: The icon to render on the line.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapIconSequence.Offset
member.summary: The distance from the start of the line at which an icon is to be rendered. This distance may be expressed as a percentage of line's length (e.g. '50%') or in pixels (e.g. '50px'). Defaults to '100%'.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapIconSequence.Repeat
member.summary: The distance between consecutive icons on the line. This distance may be expressed as a percentage of the line's length (e.g. '50%') or in pixels (e.g. '50px'). To disable repeating of the icon, specify '0'. Defaults to '0'.

member.name: T:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapIconSequenceSymbol
member.summary: Describes a symbol, which consists of a vector path with styling. A symbol can be used as the icon of a marker, or placed on a polyline.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapIconSequenceSymbol.Path
member.summary: The symbol's path, which is a built-in symbol path, or a custom path expressed using SVG path notation. Required.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapIconSequenceSymbol.Anchor
member.summary: The position at which to anchor an image in correspondence to the location of the marker on the map. By default, the anchor is located along the center point of the bottom of the image.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapIconSequenceSymbol.FillColor
member.summary: The symbol's fill color. All CSS3 colors are supported except for extended named colors. For symbol markers, this defaults to 'black'. For symbols on polylines, this defaults to the stroke color of the corresponding polyline.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapIconSequenceSymbol.FillOpacity
member.summary: The symbol's fill opacity. Defaults to 0.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapIconSequenceSymbol.LabelOrigin
member.summary: The origin of the label relative to the top-left corner of the icon image, if a label is supplied by the marker. By default, the origin is located in the center point of the image.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapIconSequenceSymbol.Rotation
member.summary: The angle by which to rotate the symbol, expressed clockwise in degrees. Defaults to 0. A symbol in an IconSequence where fixedRotation is false is rotated relative to the angle of the edge on which it lies.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapIconSequenceSymbol.Scale
member.summary: The amount by which the symbol is scaled in size. For symbol markers, this defaults to 1; after scaling, the symbol may be of any size. For symbols on a polyline, this defaults to the stroke weight of the polyline; after scaling, the symbol must lie inside a square 22 pixels in size centered at the symbol's anchor.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapIconSequenceSymbol.StrokeColor
member.summary: The symbol's stroke color. All CSS3 colors are supported except for extended named colors. For symbol markers, this defaults to 'black'. For symbols on a polyline, this defaults to the stroke color of the polyline.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapIconSequenceSymbol.StrokeOpacity
member.summary: The symbol's stroke opacity. For symbol markers, this defaults to 1. For symbols on a polyline, this defaults to the stroke opacity of the polyline.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapIconSequenceSymbol.StrokeWeight
member.summary: The symbol's stroke weight. Defaults to the scale of the symbol.

member.name: M:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapIconSequenceSymbol.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Default constructor.
member.param: The symbol's path

member.name: T:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapControlPositions
member.summary: Identifiers used to specify the placement of controls on the map. Controls are positioned relative to other controls in the same layout position. Controls that are added first are positioned closer to the edge of the map.

member.name: F:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapControlPositions.TOP_LEFT
member.summary: Elements are positioned in the top left and flow towards the middle.

member.name: F:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapControlPositions.TOP_CENTER
member.summary: Elements are positioned in the center of the top row.

member.name: F:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapControlPositions.TOP_RIGHT
member.summary: Elements are positioned in the top right and flow towards the middle.

member.name: F:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapControlPositions.LEFT_CENTER
member.summary: Elements are positioned in the center of the left side.

member.name: F:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapControlPositions.LEFT_TOP
member.summary: Elements are positioned on the left, below top-left elements, and flow downwards.

member.name: F:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapControlPositions.LEFT_BOTTOM
member.summary: Elements are positioned on the left, above bottom-left elements, and flow upwards.

member.name: F:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapControlPositions.RIGHT_TOP
member.summary: Elements are positioned on the right, below top-right elements, and flow downwards.

member.name: F:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapControlPositions.RIGHT_CENTER
member.summary: Elements are positioned in the center of the right side.

member.name: F:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapControlPositions.RIGHT_BOTTOM
member.summary: Elements are positioned on the right, above bottom-right elements, and flow upwards.

member.name: F:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapControlPositions.BOTTOM_LEFT
member.summary: Elements are positioned in the bottom left and flow towards the middle. Elements are positioned to the right of the Google logo.

member.name: F:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapControlPositions.BOTTOM_CENTER
member.summary: Elements are positioned in the center of the bottom row.

member.name: F:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapControlPositions.BOTTOM_RIGHT
member.summary: Elements are positioned in the bottom right and flow towards the middle. Elements are positioned to the left of the copyrights.

member.summary: Custom control info to add to the Map that will execute callbacks for events.

member.name: T:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapGestureHandlingTypes
member.summary: This setting controls how the API handles gestures on the map.

member.name: F:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapGestureHandlingTypes.Auto
member.summary: (default) Gesture handling is either cooperative or greedy, depending on whether the page is scrollable or in an iframe.

member.name: F:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapGestureHandlingTypes.Cooperative
member.summary: Scroll events and one-finger touch gestures scroll the page, and do not zoom or pan the map. Two-finger touch gestures pan and zoom the map. Scroll events with a ctrl key or ⌘ key pressed zoom the map.

member.name: F:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapGestureHandlingTypes.Greedy
member.summary: All touch gestures and scroll events pan or zoom the map.

member.name: F:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapGestureHandlingTypes.None
member.summary: The map cannot be panned or zoomed by user gestures.

member.name: T:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapInfoWindow
member.summary: Info Window to display HTML content on Map.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapInfoWindow.Content
member.summary: HTML content of the Info Window.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapInfoWindow.MaxWidth
member.summary: Maximum allowed with of the Info Window.

member.name: T:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapLatLngBounds
member.summary: A LatLngBounds instance represents a rectangle in geographical coordinates, including one that crosses the 180 degrees longitudinal meridian.

member.name: M:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapLatLngBounds.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor

member.name: M:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapLatLngBounds.#ctor(Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.GoogleMapLatLng,Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.GoogleMapLatLng)
member.summary: Initialize object for Map restrictions
member.param: The south-west corner of this bounds.
The north-east corner of this bounds.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapLatLngBounds.Center
member.summary: Computes the center of this LatLngBounds Equivalent with `getCenter()` method call but it would require JsInterop.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapLatLngBounds.NorthEast
member.summary: Returns the north-east corner of this bounds. Equivalent with `getNorthEast()` method call but it would require JsInterop.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapLatLngBounds.SouthWest
member.summary: Returns the south-west corner of this bounds. Equivalent with `getSouthWest()` method call but it would require JsInterop.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapLatLngBounds.Span
member.summary: Converts the given map bounds to a lat/lng span. Equivalent with `toSpan()` method call but it would require JsInterop.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapLatLngBounds.IsEmpty
member.summary: Returns if the bounds are empty. Equivalent with `isEmpty()` method call but it would require JsInterop.

member.name: T:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapRestriction
member.summary: Restrictions coordinates for NOTE: Google Maps restriction is basically a MAX Zoom level. So it does not allow users to zoom out (zoom level value forced). In order to notify Blazor about the maximum Zoom level two-way binding MUST be used: `@bind-Zoom="_jsMapZoomLevel" @bind-Zoom:event="OnMapZoomLevelChanged"`

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapRestriction.LatLngBounds
member.summary: Latitude and Longitude SW/NE corners of the bound.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapRestriction.StrictBounds
member.summary: Is restriction strict.

member.summary: IDs of map types to show in the control.

member.summary: Position id. Used to specify the position of the control on the map. The default position is TOP_RIGHT.

member.summary: Style id. Used to select what style of map type control to display.

member.summary: Clear list.

member.summary: Resets the list of Map types with the given params array.
member.param: Required map types to use

member.name: T:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapTypeControlStyles
member.summary: Identifiers for common MapTypesControls.

member.name: F:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapTypeControlStyles.DEFAULT
member.summary: When the DEFAULT control is shown, it will vary according to window size and other factors. The DEFAULT control may change in future versions of the API.

member.name: F:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapTypeControlStyles.HORIZONTAL_BAR
member.summary: The standard horizontal radio buttons bar.

member.name: F:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapTypeControlStyles.DROPDOWN_MENU
member.summary: A dropdown menu for the screen realestate conscious.

member.name: T:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapTypeCustomStyle
member.summary: The MapTypeStyle is a collection of selectors and stylers that define how the map should be styled. Selectors specify the map features and/or elements that should be affected, and stylers specify how those features and elements should be modified.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapTypeCustomStyle.Stylers
member.summary: The style rules to apply to the selected map features and elements. The rules are applied in the order that you specify in this array.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapTypeCustomStyle.ElementType
member.summary: The element to which a styler should be applied. An element is a visual aspect of a feature on the map. Example: a label, an icon, the stroke or fill applied to the geometry, and more. Optional. If elementType is not specified, the value is assumed to be 'all'.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapTypeCustomStyle.FeatureType
member.summary: The feature, or group of features, to which a styler should be applied. Optional. If featureType is not specified, the value is assumed to be 'all'.

member.name: T:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapTypes
member.summary: The Maps Static API creates maps in several formats

member.name: F:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapTypes.Roadmap
member.summary: (default) specifies a standard roadmap image, as is normally shown on the Google Maps website.

member.name: F:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapTypes.Satellite
member.summary: Specifies satellite image.

member.name: F:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapTypes.Terrain
member.summary: Specifies a physical relief map image, showing terrain and vegetation.

member.name: F:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapTypes.Hybrid
member.summary: Specifies a hybrid of the satellite and roadmap image, showing a transparent layer of major streets and place names on the satellite image.

member.name: T:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleStaticMapImageFormats
member.summary: Google maps images may be returned in several common web graphics formats

member.summary: Set of marker style descriptors.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleStaticMapMarker.CustomIcon

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleStaticMapMarker.Locations
member.summary: Each marker descriptor must contain a set of one or more locations defining where to place the marker on the map.

member.summary: Sets map Zoom level.

member.name: M:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.IGoogleMapService.SetHeadingAsync(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the compass heading for aerial imagery measured in degrees from cardinal direction North.
member.param: Required heading 0-360

member.name: M:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.IGoogleMapService.SetTiltAsync(System.Byte)
member.summary: Controls the automatic switching behavior for the angle of incidence of the map. The only allowed values are 0 and 45. setTilt(0) causes the map to always use a 0° overhead view regardless of the zoom level and viewport. setTilt(45) causes the tilt angle to automatically switch to 45 whenever 45° imagery is available for the current zoom level and viewport, and switch back to 0 whenever 45° imagery is not available (this is the default behavior).
member.param: Required tilt 0 or 45

member.name: M:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.IGoogleMapService.ResizeMapAsync
member.summary: Notify Maps JS about container DIV resized.

member.name: M:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.IGoogleMapService.SetClickableIconsAsync(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Controls whether the map icons are clickable or not. A map icon represents a point of interest, also known as a POI. To disable the clickability of map icons, pass a value of false to this method.
member.param: Icons are clickable or not

member.name: M:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.IGoogleMapService.SetOptionsAsync(System.Dynamic.ExpandoObject)
member.summary: Sets given options to Map.
member.param: Google JavaScript Maps options

Enumerable markers removed or replaced

member.name: M:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.IGoogleMapService.GetBoundsAsync
member.summary: Returns the lat/lng bounds of the current viewport. If more than one copy of the world is visible, the bounds range in longitude from -180 to 180 degrees inclusive. If the map is not yet initialized or center and zoom have not been set then the result is undefined. For vector maps with non-zero tilt or heading, the returned lat/lng bounds represents the smallest bounding box that includes the visible region of the map's viewport.

member.name: M:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.IGoogleMapService.GetCenterAsync
member.summary: Returns the position displayed at the center of the map. Note that this LatLng object is not wrapped. See LatLng for more information. If the center or bounds have not been set then the result is undefined.

member.name: M:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.IGoogleMapService.GetDivAsync
member.summary: Returns HTMLElement The mapDiv of the map.

member.name: T:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapMarker
member.summary: MarkerOptions object used to define the properties that can be set on a Marker with event callbacks.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapMarker.OnClickCallback
member.summary: Callback function called when Marker was clicked.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapMarker.OnDragCallback
member.summary: Callback function called when Marker dragging.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapMarker.OnDragEndCallback
member.summary: Callback function called when Marker drag ended.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapMarker.OnDragStartCallback
member.summary: Callback function called when Marker drag started.

member.name: M:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapMarker.#ctor(Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.GeolocationCoordinate)
member.summary: Default constructor.
member.param: Marker position on the Map

member.name: T:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapMarkerAnimationTypes
member.summary: Animations that can be played on a marker.

member.name: F:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapMarkerAnimationTypes.None
member.summary: No animation.

member.name: F:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapMarkerAnimationTypes.BOUNCE
member.summary: Marker bounces until animation is stopped.

member.name: F:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapMarkerAnimationTypes.DROP
member.summary: Marker falls from the top of the map ending with a small bounce.

member.name: T:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapMarkerBase
member.summary: MarkerOptions object used to define the properties that can be set on a Marker.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapMarkerBase.Id
member.summary: Id of the Custom control.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapMarkerBase.AnchorPoint
member.summary: The offset from the marker's position to the tip of an InfoWindow that has been opened with the marker as anchor.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapMarkerBase.Animation
member.summary: Which animation to play when marker is added to a map.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapMarkerBase.Clickable
member.summary: If true, the marker receives mouse and touch events. Default value is true.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapMarkerBase.CrossOnDrag
member.summary: If false, disables cross that appears beneath the marker when dragging. This option is true by default.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapMarkerBase.Cursor
member.summary: Mouse cursor to show on hover.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapMarkerBase.Draggable
member.summary: If true, the marker can be dragged. Default value is false.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapMarkerBase.Label
member.summary: Adds a label to the marker. The label can either be a string, or a MarkerLabel object.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapMarkerBase.Icon
member.summary: Icon for the foreground. If a string is provided, it is treated as though it were an Icon with the string as url.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapMarkerBase.Opacity
member.summary: The marker's opacity between 0.0 and 1.0.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapMarkerBase.Optimized
member.summary: Optimization renders many markers as a single static element. Optimized rendering is enabled by default. Disable optimized rendering for animated GIFs or PNGs, or when each marker must be rendered as a separate DOM element (advanced usage only).

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapMarkerBase.Position
member.summary: Marker position. Required in order to display the marker.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapMarkerBase.Shape
member.summary: Image map region definition used for drag/click.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapMarkerBase.Title
member.summary: Rollover text. If provided, an accessibility text (e.g. for use with screen readers) will be added to the marker with the provided value.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapMarkerBase.Visible
member.summary: If true, the marker is visible.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapMarkerBase.ZIndex
member.summary: All markers are displayed on the map in order of their zIndex, with higher values displaying in front of markers with lower values.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapMarkerBase.InfoWindow
member.summary: Info Window to show for Marker on click.

member.name: M:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapMarkerBase.#ctor(Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.GeolocationCoordinate)
member.summary: Default constructor.
member.param: Marker position on the Map

member.name: T:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapMarkerCustomIcon
member.summary: Rather than use Google's marker icons, you are free to use your own custom icons instead.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapMarkerCustomIcon.IconUrl
member.summary: Custom icon URL.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapMarkerCustomIcon.Anchor
member.summary: Icon is position in relation to the specified markers locations.

member.name: T:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapMarkerCustomIconAnchors
member.summary: The anchor point sets how the icon is placed in relation to the specified markers locations.

member.name: T:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapMarkerLabel
member.summary: These options specify the appearance of a marker label. A marker label is a string (often a single character) which will appear inside the marker.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapMarkerLabel.Text
member.summary: The text to be displayed in the label.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapMarkerLabel.ClassName
member.summary: The className property of the label's element (equivalent to the element's class attribute). Multiple space-separated CSS classes can be added.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapMarkerLabel.Color
member.summary: The color of the label text. Default color is black.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapMarkerLabel.FontFamily
member.summary: The font family of the label text (equivalent to the CSS font-family property).

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapMarkerLabel.FontSize
member.summary: The font size of the label text (equivalent to the CSS font-size property). Default size is 14px.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapMarkerLabel.FontWeight
member.summary: The font weight of the label text (equivalent to the CSS font-weight property).

member.name: M:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapMarkerLabel.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Default constructor.
member.param: Label text

member.name: T:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapMarkerLabelIcon
member.summary: A structure representing a Marker icon image.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapMarkerLabelIcon.Url
member.summary: The URL of the image or sprite sheet.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapMarkerLabelIcon.Anchor
member.summary: The position at which to anchor an image in correspondence to the location of the marker on the map. By default, the anchor is located along the center point of the bottom of the image.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapMarkerLabelIcon.LabelOrigin
member.summary: The origin of the label relative to the top-left corner of the icon image, if a label is supplied by the marker. By default, the origin is located in the center point of the image.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapMarkerLabelIcon.Origin
member.summary: The position of the image within a sprite, if any. By default, the origin is located at the top left corner of the image (0, 0).

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapMarkerLabelIcon.ScaledSize
member.summary: The size of the entire image after scaling, if any. Use this property to stretch/shrink an image or a sprite.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapMarkerLabelIcon.Size
member.summary: The display size of the sprite or image. When using sprites, you must specify the sprite size. If the size is not provided, it will be set when the image loads.

member.name: M:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapMarkerLabelIcon.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Default constructor.
member.param: Icon Url

member.name: T:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapMarkerShape
member.summary: This object defines the clickable region of a marker image.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapMarkerShape.Coords
member.summary: The format of this attribute depends on the value of the type and follows the w3 AREA coords specification found at http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-html40/struct/objects.html#adef-coords.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapMarkerShape.ShapeType
member.summary: Describes the shape's type and can be circle, poly or rect.

member.name: T:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapMarkerShapeTypes
member.summary: Describes the shape's type and can be circle, poly or rect.

member.name: T:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapMarkerSizes
member.summary: Specifies the size of marker

member.name: T:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapMarkerStyle
member.summary: The set of marker style descriptors is a series of value assignments separated by the pipe (|) character.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapMarkerStyle.Size
member.summary: Specifies the size of marker from the set {tiny, mid, small}. If no size parameter is set, the marker will appear in its default (normal) size.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapMarkerStyle.Color
member.summary: Specifies a 24-bit color (example: color=0xFFFFCC) or a predefined color from the set {black, brown, green, purple, yellow, blue, gray, orange, red, white}.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapMarkerStyle.Label
member.summary: Specifies a single uppercase alphanumeric character from the set {A-Z, 0-9}.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMapMarkerStyle.Scale
member.summary: Scale value is multiplied with the marker image size to produce the actual output size of the marker in pixels. Default scale value is 1; accepted values are 1, 2, and 4.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMap.MapId
member.summary: Map HTML container Id. It can be used when multiple Maps added to one page.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMap.InnerElementReference
member.summary: Exposes a Blazor of the wrapped around HTML element. It can be used e.g. for JS interop, etc.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMap.GoogleMapService
member.summary: Exposes which is handling JsInterop. This instance can be used for access more GoogleMap features.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMap.BackgroundColor
member.summary: Color used for the background of the Map div. This color will be visible when tiles have not yet loaded as the user pans. This option can only be set when the map is initialized.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMap.ControlSize
member.summary: Size in pixels of the controls appearing on the map. This value must be supplied directly when creating the Map.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMap.CustomControls
member.summary: Custom controls to add to the Map that will execute callbacks for events. This option can only be set when the map is initialized. Use method to set it up.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMap.Restriction
member.summary: Restrictions for Maps by coordinates SW/NE. This option can only be set when the map is initialized. Use method to set it up.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMap.Markers
member.summary: MarkerOptions object used to define the properties that can be set on a Marker. ObservableCollection can be initialized only once! Add or remove items to the collection (use `OnMapInitialized` event or user interactions) the change marker properties (Marker properties value changes not detected).

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMap.Zoom
member.summary: Defines the zoom level of the map, which determines the magnification level of the map.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMap.ZoomControl
member.summary: The enabled/disabled state of the Zoom control.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMap.ZoomControlOptionsPosition
member.summary: The display options for the Zoom control.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMap.MaxZoom
member.summary: The maximum zoom level which will be displayed on the map. If omitted, or set to null, the maximum zoom from the current map type is used instead.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMap.MinZoom
member.summary: The minimum zoom level which will be displayed on the map. If omitted, or set to null, the minimum zoom from the current map type is used instead.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMap.Width
member.summary: Maps image Width in px.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMap.Height
member.summary: Maps image Height in px.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMap.Center
member.summary: Maps center position set by the given Coordinates or Address. Also can be set the divece location by setting to `true`.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMap.AnimateCenterChange
member.summary: Apply animation on Maps center change.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMap.MapType
member.summary: Defines the type of map to construct. There are several possible maptype values, including roadmap, satellite, hybrid, and terrain.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMap.MapTypeControlOptions
member.summary: Defines the type of map to construct. There are several possible maptype values, including roadmap, satellite, hybrid, and terrain.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMap.Heading
member.summary: The heading for aerial imagery in degrees measured clockwise from cardinal direction North. Headings are snapped to the nearest available angle for which imagery is available.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMap.Tilt
member.summary: Controls the automatic switching behavior for the angle of incidence of the map. The only allowed values are 0 and 45. 45° imagery is not available (this is the default behavior). 45° imagery is only available for satellite and hybrid map types, within some locations, and at some zoom levels.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMap.ClickableIcons
member.summary: When false, map icons are not clickable. A map icon represents a point of interest, also known as a POI. By default map icons are clickable.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMap.DisableDefaultUI
member.summary: Enables/disables all default UI buttons. May be overridden individually. Does not disable the keyboard controls, which are separately controlled.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMap.DisableDoubleClickZoom
member.summary: Enables/disables zoom and center on double click. Enabled by default.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMap.DraggableCursor
member.summary: The name or url of the cursor to display when mousing over a draggable map. This property uses the css cursor attribute to change the icon.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMap.DraggingCursor
member.summary: The name or url of the cursor to display when the map is being dragged. This property uses the css cursor attribute to change the icon.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMap.FullscreenControl
member.summary: The enabled/disabled state of the Fullscreen control.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMap.FullscreenControlPositon
member.summary: The display options for the Fullscreen control.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMap.GestureHandling
member.summary: This setting controls how the API handles gestures on the map.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMap.KeyboardShortcuts
member.summary: If false, prevents the map from being controlled by the keyboard. Keyboard shortcuts are enabled by default.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMap.MapTypeControl
member.summary: The initial enabled/disabled state of the Map type control.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMap.RotateControl
member.summary: The enabled/disabled state of the Rotate control.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMap.RotateControlOptionsPosition
member.summary: The display options for the Rotate control.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMap.ScaleControl
member.summary: The initial enabled/disabled state of the Scale control.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMap.StreetViewControl
member.summary: The initial enabled/disabled state of the Street View Pegman control. This control is part of the default UI, and should be set to false when displaying a map type on which the Street View road overlay should not appear (e.g. a non-Earth map type).

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMap.StreetViewControlOptionsPosition
member.summary: The initial display options for the Street View Pegman control.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMap.Styles
member.summary: Styles to apply to each of the default map types. Note that for satellite/hybrid and terrain modes, these styles will only apply to labels and geometry.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMap.CenterCurrentLocationOnLoad
member.summary: If set `true` then Maps try to detect device location by using and center on the Map once when Map was first loaded. Note: it will override location, but detecting geolocation is an `async` operation. It means map might be centered after some time the page rendered or location might fail!

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMap.ApiKey
member.summary: Required allows you to monitor your application's API usage in the Google Cloud Console.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMap.OnMapInitialized
member.summary: Callback function for Google Map initialized event.

member.summary: Callback function for Google Map clicked event.

member.summary: Callback function for Google Map double clicked event.

member.summary: Callback function for Google Map mouse down event.

member.summary: Callback function for Google Map mouse move event.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMap.OnMapMouseOver
member.summary: Callback function for Google Map mouse enter event.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMap.OnMapMouseOut
member.summary: Callback function for Google Map mouse leaving event.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMap.OnMapCenterChanged
member.summary: Callback function for Google Map Center point changed event. Can be used for Two-way binding: @bind-Center="{variable}" @bind-Center:event="OnMapCenterChanged".

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMap.OnMapZoomLevelChanged
member.summary: Callback function for Google Map zoom level changed event. Can be used for Two-way binding: @bind-Zoom="{variable}" @bind-Zoom:event="OnMapZoomLevelChanged".

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMap.OnMapTypeChanged
member.summary: Callback function for Google Map type changed event. Can be used for Two-way binding: @bind-MapType="{variable}" @bind-MapType:event="OnMapTypeChanged".

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMap.OnMapHeadingChanged
member.summary: Callback function for Google Map heading changed event. Can be used for Two-way binding: @bind-Heading="{variable}" @bind-ZoomLevel:event="OnMapHeadingChanged".

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMap.OnMapTiltChanged
member.summary: Callback function for Google Map tilt position changed event. Can be used for Two-way binding: @bind-Tilt="{variable}" @bind-ZoomLevel:event="OnMapTiltChanged".

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMap.OnMapBoundsChanged
member.summary: Callback function for Google Map boundaries changed event.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMap.OnMapProjectionChanged
member.summary: Callback function for Google Map projection changed event.

member.summary: Callback function for Google Map draggable changed event.

member.summary: Callback function for Google Map street-view changed event.

member.summary: Callback function for Google Map dragging event.

member.summary: Callback function for Google Map drag ended event.

member.summary: Callback function for Google Map drag started event.

member.summary: Callback function for Google Map resized event.

member.summary: Callback function for Google Map tiles loaded event.

member.summary: Callback function for Google Map idle event.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMap.OnCurrentLocationDetected
member.summary: Callback function called when location successfully detected with . Device positon will be supplied in the event which should be used to override parameter value.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMap.AllOtherAttributes
member.summary: Blazor capture for any unmatched HTML attributes.

member.name: M:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleMap.CenterCurrentLocationOnMapAsync
member.summary: Starts an async operation to try to detect device location by using . Once operation has finished successfully event will be fired.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleStaticMap.InnerElementReference
member.summary: Exposes a Blazor of the wrapped around HTML element. It can be used e.g. for JS interop, etc.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleStaticMap.ZoomLevel
member.summary: Defines the zoom level of the map, which determines the magnification level of the map.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleStaticMap.Width
member.summary: Maps image Width in px.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleStaticMap.Height
member.summary: Maps image Height in px.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleStaticMap.HighResolution
member.summary: Affects the number of pixels that are returned. scale=2 returns twice as many pixels as scale=1 while retaining the same coverage area and level of detail (i.e. the contents of the map don't change). This is useful when developing for high-resolution displays.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleStaticMap.MapType
member.summary: Defines the type of map to construct. There are several possible maptype values, including roadmap, satellite, hybrid, and terrain.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleStaticMap.ImageFormat
member.summary: Defines the format of the resulting image. By default, the Maps Static API creates PNG images. There are several possible formats including GIF, JPEG and PNG types.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleStaticMap.Language
member.summary: Defines the language to use for display of labels on map tiles. Note that this parameter is only supported for some country tiles.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleStaticMap.Region
member.summary: Defines the appropriate borders to display, based on geo-political sensitivities.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleStaticMap.Center
member.summary: Maps center position set by the given Coordinates or Address . Also can be set the device location by setting to `true`.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleStaticMap.CenterCurrentLocationOnLoad
member.summary: If set `true` then Maps try to detect device location by using and center on the Map once when Map was first loaded. Note: it will override location, but detecting geolocation is an `async` operation. It means map might be centered after some time the page rendered or location might fail!

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleStaticMap.ApiKey
member.summary: Required allows you to monitor your application's API usage in the Google Cloud Console.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleStaticMap.Signature
member.summary: A digital signature used to verify that any site generating requests using your API key is authorized to do so. Requests without a digital signature might fail.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleStaticMap.Markers
member.summary: The markers parameter defines a set of one or more markers (map pins) at a set of locations .

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleStaticMap.Path
member.summary: Defines a single path of two or more connected points to overlay on the image at specified locations .

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleStaticMap.VisibleLocations
member.summary: Specifies one or more locations that should remain visible on the map, though no markers or other indicators will be displayed .

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Maps.Google.GoogleStaticMap.Style
member.summary: Defines a custom style to alter the presentation of a specific feature (roads, parks, and other features) of the map.
